actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the 15th anniversary of the creation of Health Savings Accounts should be remembered as a turning point in the history of health care in the United States.

summary.text:
Commemorates the 15th anniversary of the creation of health savings accounts (HSAs).

Expresses support for the expansion of HSAs in public insurance programs.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the 15th anniversary of the creation of Health Savings Accounts should be remembered as a turning point in the history of health care in the United States.
